title: Modular Nanoarchitected Metamaterials: CAD-Defined Gyroid and Hybrid Lattices for Scalable Lightweight Structural Systems
description: This dataset contains CAD files, finite element simulations, visualizations, and STL/OBJ meshes associated with the research paper: 'Modular Nanoarchitected Metamaterials: CAD-Defined Gyroid and Hybrid Lattices for Scalable Lightweight Structural Systems' by Antonios Valamontes, Kapodistrian Academy of Science. It includes 3D-printable curved panels with gyroid infill, hybrid lattice geometries, military- and aerospace-grade prototypes, and full documentation including simulation images and manufacturing notes.
notes: All STL and OBJ files included are validated for nanoscale additive manufacturing and full structural simulation. Commercial licensing available upon request.
